name: 3D MMO Celtic Heroes
description:
Enter a huge 3D world of magic, warcraft and adventure in this true open world 3D MMORPG for your mobile device!

Join together with millions of other players from across the world in real-time and enjoy a truly stunning and unforgettable MMO adventure full of epic challenging quests and battles, heroic feats and new friendships!

***** “Everything you love about an MMO. You will be addicted.”
***** “With tons of quests to do, and all the buddies you need to help you, this game will definitely have you hooked.”
***** “If you want a social MMO that rewards skill and has developers who listen to the players, this is the game for you.”

Features -

» CUSTOMISE! 5 fully customisable character classes to play - Warrior, Mage, Druid, Ranger, Rogue - hundreds of variations!

» EXPLORE! Massive stunning 3D MMO open-world gameplay (worldwide)

» SOCIALISE! Chat in real-time with players globally and build new friendships!

» EARN & TRADE! Thousands of weapons, armour and unique items

» FORM CLANS and friendships with millions of players from around the world in real-time!

» RPG style, hundreds of varied and challenging quests to complete, inspired by Celtic mythology

» VANQUISH thousands of legendary enemies including ruthless invaders, brutal trolls and ferocious fire breathing dragons

» PvP Battles and Combat Duels - Challenge your might against other Heroes and Clans!

+ Game Language: English

Millions of gamers have already ventured into the expansive world of 3D MMO Celtic Heroes the #1 FREE Mobile MMO. Join now for an epic open-world 3D MMORPG experience!

* Game access requires mobile internet or wifi connection

Nominated for Mobile Entertainment Awards 2014 – Original Game, Game Studio
Nominated for the MMO of the Year Awards 2013 (iPhone & iPad category)

FREE fully 3D Massively Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game (MMORPG). Play on iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad.
